game.name: Panic Crew
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Racing, Simulation, Early Access
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Panic Crew is a chaotic open-world co-op rescue simulator where you and your friends team up as paramedics to save lives. Find patients, stabilize them, and upgrade your ambulance!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Panic Crew is a chaotic open-world co-op rescue simulator where you and your friends team up as paramedics to save lives. Find patients, stabilize them, and upgrade your ambulance!
